title: Hot crispy wontons stuffed with chocolate and bananas
ingredients: 2 milk chocolate candy bars,16 wonton skins,2 bananas, sliced,1 pint vanilla ice cream,1/2 cup cinnamon sugar,4 cups vegetable oil

ingredients: 2 cups frozen strawberries with sugar, defrosted in microwave,1/2 pint black berries or raspberries,1 store bought angel food cake,1 canister store bought whipped cream
